section2.user_goals: 1. Reduce added sugar. 2. Reduce sodium. 3. Increase vegetable intake.

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Great work! You made great progress with increasing vegetable intake due to purchasing Lay's Classic Potato Chips and Ruffles Original Flavor Potato Snack Chips, which added vegetables, although primarily starchy ones.

Some choices this week didn’t align with your dietary goals. You purchased Luigi's Red, White, & Blue Real Italian Ice, which didn’t contribute to your goal of reducing added sugar because it contains 4.81g of added sugars.
goal_feedback.feedback_items: Luigi's Red, White, & Blue Real Italian Ice

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Some choices this week didn’t align with your dietary goals. You purchased Farm Rich Loaded Potato Skins, which didn’t contribute to your goal of reducing sodium because they have a high sodium content.

section3.fruits_explanation: You did not purchase any whole or juice-based fruit products, which contributed to a low score. Including more fruits can improve dietary fiber and vital nutrient intake. Try getting more whole fruits next time!
section3.vegetables_explanation: Your purchase of Lay's Classic Potato Chips and Ruffles Original Flavor Potato Snack Chips contained starchy vegetables, which helped achieve this score. Vegetables, including dark greens and beans, are crucial for vitamins and minerals. Consider including other vegetable varieties for better balance.
section3.grains_explanation: You did not purchase whole grains, impacting the score negatively. Whole grains provide fiber which is beneficial for digestion. Try including whole grain products such as brown rice or whole wheat bread.
section3.dairy_explanation: Farm Rich Loaded Potato Skins contributed some dairy content. Dairy provides calcium essential for bone health. Including a variety of dairy like yogurt or milk can enhance your score.
section3.protein_explanation: Excellent score! HORMEL SQUARE TABLE Slow Simmered Beef Roast Au Jus & Savory Sauce positively impacted this category. Protein is necessary for muscle maintenance. Continue incorporating a diverse protein range, including plant-based ones.
section3.fattyacids_explanation: Your score was low due to limited sources of healthy fatty acids. Fatty acids, especially omega-3s, are beneficial for heart health. Incorporating fatty fish like salmon can improve this score.

section4.refinedgrains_explanation: The inclusion of refined grains like Stouffer's Salisbury Steak Individual Frozen Meal led to an average score. Consider balancing with whole grains as refined grains can spike blood sugar due to low fiber.
section4.sodium_explanation: Farm Rich Loaded Potato Skins contributed high sodium, leading to a moderated score. High sodium can affect blood pressure negatively. Keep an eye on sodium levels and consider lower sodium alternatives.
section4.addedsugars_explanation: Luigi's Red, White, & Blue Real Italian Ice contributed to the low score for added sugars. Excess sugar can lead to weight gain and dental issues. Choose snacks with lesser added sugar content.
section4.saturatedfats_explanation: The purchase of 93% Lean / 7% Fat Lean Ground Beef resulted in a low saturated fat score. Saturated fats can contribute to heart disease. Opt for leaner or plant-based protein alternatives.

section5.recommendation1: Luigi's Red, White, & Blue Real Italian Ice contributed to negative Added Sugar score. Next week try fresh fruit or unsweetened applesauce to strengthen the score.
section5.food_to_substitute1: Luigi's Red, White, & Blue Real Italian Ice
section5.recommendation2: Farm Rich Loaded Potato Skins contributed to negative Sodium score. Next week try baked sweet potatoes or low-sodium vegetable chips to strengthen the score.
section5.recommendation3: Stouffer's Salisbury Steak Individual Frozen Meal contributed to negative Refined Grains score. Next week try quinoa or whole grain pasta meals to strengthen the score.
section5.food_to_substitute3: Stouffer's Salisbury Steak Individual Frozen Meal
